# contentView

**Instance Property**

A view object that can have a visual effect view added to it.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var contentView: UIView { get }
```

## Discussion

Add subviews to the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIVisualEffectView/contentView] and not to [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIVisualEffectView] directly.

## Retrieving view information

- **effect**: The visual effect provided by the view.
